thread.title: ‘Neo-nazi’ teen, 17, who hailed MP Jo Cox’s murderer Thomas Mair a ‘f***ing legend’ walks free from court after making explosive pipe bomb in bedroom
thread.title_full: ‘Neo-nazi’ teen, 17, who hailed MP Jo Cox’s murderer Thomas Mair a ‘f***ing legend’ walks free from court after making explosive pipe bomb in bedroom

author: hchristdoloulou
title: ‘Neo-nazi’ teen, 17, who hailed MP Jo Cox’s murderer Thomas Mair a ‘f***ing legend’ walks free from court after making explosive pipe bomb in bedroom
text:
Opinion 'NEO-NAZI' TEEN CLEARED ‘Neo-nazi’ teen, 17, who hailed MP Jo Cox’s murderer Thomas Mair a ‘f***ing legend’ walks free from court after making explosive pipe bomb in bedroom 
The 17-year-old went online the day after last June’s ­murder to praise Hitler-loving Thomas Mair BY HOLLY CHRISTODOULOU
